title: MD
biography: José Pablo Valenzuela García was a leading Cuban cornetist, composer and bandleader.
aiSummary: Pablo Valenzuela is a molecular biology specialist with an H-index of 49 at Fundación Ciencia & Vida (Member). Has been published in Nature, Molecular Cell, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
